alert.note: Alert for Bent; Kiowa; Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 5:13PM MDT until May 27 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Prowers County in southeastern Colorado... South central Kiowa County in southeastern Colorado... Northeastern Bent County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 545 PM MDT. * At 513 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hasty, or 20 miles west of Lamar, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... McClave around 530 PM MDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
